amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part A of House Report 117-74 as en bloc No. 1: Nos. 1, 2, 3, 5, and 6.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 1 comprised of amendments numbered 1, 2, 3, 5, and 6, printed in Part A of House Report 117-74.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney, Carolyn B. amendments (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 184 (Roll no. 193).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Mrs. Maloney, Carolyn B.
